channel.title: Sam Robbins' Website on Christophe Oosterlynck
channel.description: Recent content in Sam Robbins' Website on Christophe Oosterlynck

item.title: AXA Mobile Banking Service
item.description: At Flow Pilots I’ve started out as a developer on the AXA Mobile Banking app. After a while I became the tech lead on this project. I was responsible for Functionality The app started as an app to provide the user with basic daily banking functions. This quickly expanded into more advanced features as consulting and managing investments and requesting loans. Technology The app started out as a Xamarin Android and iOS app with a shared core codebase.

item.title: Making a new Website
item.description: For a long time this website has had a couple of links to contact me, but those days are over. Now I have a brand new Hugo website with a custom written theme complete with A homepage with more social links, and description of my skills An about page with description of who I am A portfolio page to showcase all my projects A blog Why Hugo? The first question is why a site builder?
